verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees רַ֭בַּת <S%H7227><s%> Many a time צְרָר֣וּנִי <S%H6887><s%> have they afflicted מִנְּעוּרַ֑י <S%H5271><s%> me from my youth יֹֽאמַר־ <S%H559><s%> now say נָ֝א <S%H4994><s%> now יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> may Israel

רַ֭בַּת <S%H7227><s%> Many a time צְרָר֣וּנִי <S%H6887><s%> have they afflicted מִנְּעוּרָ֑י <S%H5271><s%> me from my youth גַּ֝ם <S%H1571><s%> Yet לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יָ֥כְלוּ <S%H3201><s%> yet they have not prevailed לִֽי׃

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon גַּ֭בִּי <S%H1354><s%> upon my back חָרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H2790><s%> The plowers חֹרְשִׁ֑ים <S%H2790><s%> plowed הֶ֝אֱרִ֗יכוּ <S%H748><s%> they made long [לְמַעֲנֹותָם כ] (לְמַעֲנִיתָֽם׃ <S%H4618><s%> furrow ק)
יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> [is] righteous קִ֝צֵּ֗ץ <S%H7112><s%> he hath cut asunder עֲב֣וֹת <S%H5688><s%> the cords רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked

יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Let them all be confounded וְיִסֹּ֣גוּ <S%H5472><s%> and turned אָח֑וֹר <S%H268><s%> back כֹּ֝֗ל <S%H3605><s%> may all שֹׂנְאֵ֥י <S%H8130><s%> that hate צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> Zion

יִ֭הְיוּ <S%H1961><s%> them be like כַּחֲצִ֣יר <S%H2682><s%> Let them be as the grass גַּגּ֑וֹת <S%H1406><s%> [upon] the housetops שֶׁקַּדְמַ֖ת <S%H6927><s%> afore שָׁלַ֣ף <S%H8025><s%> it groweth up יָבֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> which withereth

שֶׁלֹּ֤א <S%H3808><s%> does not מִלֵּ֖א <S%H4390><s%> filleth כַפּ֥וֹ <S%H3709><s%> not his hand קוֹצֵ֗ר <S%H7114><s%> Wherewith the mower וְחִצְנ֥וֹ <S%H2683><s%> his bosom מְעַמֵּֽר׃ <S%H6014><s%> nor he that bindeth sheaves

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אָֽמְר֨וּ ׀ <S%H559><s%> say הָעֹבְרִ֗ים <S%H5674><s%> Neither do they which go by בִּרְכַּֽת־ <S%H1293><s%> The blessing יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about בֵּרַ֥כְנוּ <S%H1288><s%> [be] upon you we bless אֶ֝תְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> you in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD
